title: French officials dispute Noem's claim about canceling Macron meeting
summary: Kristi Noem claimed in her memoir that she canceled a scheduled meeting with French President Emmanuel Macron over his comments about Hamas. French officials from the Élysée Palace directly contradicted this, stating there was no record of any scheduled meeting and no invitation was ever extended to Noem. This was the second false claim about meeting world leaders discovered in her book.
